item.description:
Among the various shows and venues around Beantown it would be remiss to leave out a staple "feel-good" dive bar that is a must for those who just want to have some fun - the Cantab Lounge in Central.

It's a change of pace from the big stadium shows, or world-class jazz in Newport, or even the stomping local rock lounges - it's a dive with an unmistakable feel-good vibe that attracts a crowd every night across a broad age range where everyone's having fun.

The Chicken Slacks are a full-sound Motown groove and boogie band and the whole place is on the dance floor. Complete with vibes, horns, and truckloads of soul this venue and band is about having fun, letting loose in the classic Motown-style dance dive with friends.

*** I've re-scheduled this to Thursday night June 28th ***

Show starts at 9p, just come out for a couple of hours. 11p - 7a is 8 full hours so you'll be fine at the office :)
item.name: Cantab Lounge - Motown night (rescheduled)
